headline: Dayforce (DAYS) Climbs 31% on $12.3-Billion Thoma Bravo Merger
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Defy Chaos With Jaw-Dropping Gains. Dayforce Inc. (NYSE:DAY) is one of the top performers of last week. Dayforce Inc. soared by 30.86 percent week-on-week as investors gobbled up shares following news that it was set to be acquired by Thoma Bravo for $12.3 billion. In a joint statement last week, Dayforce […]
